description: This table extracts the termination date for the coverage stored in RFL_OUTSD_CVG. The corresponding payer, plan, insurance ID, effective date, authorization and precert number and comments can be found in RFL_OUTSD_CVG_PAYER,  RFL_OUTSD_CVG_PLAN, RFL_OUTSD_CVG_INS, RFL_OUTSD_CVG_EFF_DT, RFL_OUTSD_CVG_AUTH_NUM, RFL_OUTSD_CVG_PRECERT_NUM and RFL_OUTSD_CVG_CMT tables for matching values of REFERRAL_ID, GROUP_LINE, and VALUE_LINE.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the referral record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple updates received from an outside organization for a referral. Together with REFERRAL_ID, this forms the foreign key to the RFL_OUTSD_CVG table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple outside coverages received in a referral update from an outside organization for a referral in the RFL_OUTSD_CVG table.

columns.name: OUT_CVG_TERM_DATE
columns.description: Termination date for one of the multiple outside coverages received in a referral update from an outside organization for a referral in the RFL_OUTSD_CVG table.
